alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Chariton; Linn; Livingston; Macon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 5:56PM CDT until September 23 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Chariton County in north central Missouri... Southern Linn County in north central Missouri... Northeastern Carroll County in north central Missouri... Southwestern Macon County in north central Missouri... Southeastern Livingston County in north central Missouri... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 556 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Hale, or 10 miles southwest of Brookfield, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brookfield, Marceline, Salisbury, Brunswick, Keytesville, Bucklin, Meadville, Hale, Laclede, New Cambria, Mendon, De Witt, Sumner, Rothville, Triplett, Dalton, Prairie Hill, Wien and Saint Catherine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
